name: reportingwithai-agent-nodejs
description: Node.js/TypeScript Lambda for chart generation with LangChain

scripts.build: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --external:@aws-sdk/* --external:aws-sdk --external:langchain --external:@langchain/* && esbuild src/manual_run.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=esm --outfile=dist/manual_run.js --external:@aws-sdk/* --external:aws-sdk --external:langchain --external:@langchain/* && cp src/agent/system-prompt.md dist/system-prompt.md
